title: There was an error locking in your champion bug
body: This bug happens to me every single time I try to lock in my champion in a ranked champ select and it will sometimes even pop up again after closing it. Could someone tell me how to fix this bug? Because it sure isn't my sheitey 11 ms connection. I'm currently in a 30 minute waiting queue trying to not rip my hair out and I don't actually get why this bug hasn't already been fixed. If someone could tell me how to stop this from happening I would be really happy. thx
